name: Mass Defective
description:
Made for the Nashville Game Jam 2016 with the prompt of Demake

By Cory Martin and Meghan Connor

So uh.. We attempted to make a squad command game based loosely on the squad concept in Mass Effect. It kinda works...kinda...yeah

enjoy

Controls:

look around with mouse

WASD for movement

F for the strange strawberry man to follow you

Look and press E to get him to go to a certain location.
